Description: SuperPhone is a powerful, scalable, 1-to-1 text marketing platform that helps you build deeper relationships by keeping you top of mind.
Name: SuperPhone

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Lists all contacts for this SuperPhone account.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Gets a single contact by ID, phone number or email address.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: Lists contacts created since the last run.
